personalInfo.clubAffl: Sea Island GC (St. Simons Island, Georgia)

tourBios.exmtStatus: Fully Exempt: Top Finisher from Prior Year Money List (26-60)
tourBios.curYearHigh: Turned in his first top-10 of the year when he T9 at the News Sentinel Open. Shot four sub-par rounds at Fox Den CC, highlighted by a 67-66 opening that gave him a share of the 36-hole lead.
tourBios.carHigh: Played on the Canadian Tour from 2006-11. 2012: Made the cut in 11 of 23 starts and had four top-10 finishes to wind up the year No. 53 on the money list...Collected his first career Web.com Tour top-10, with a T4 at the South Georgia Classic, where he was T4 in Driving Accuracy...Shot a 7-under 65 in the third round of the United Leasing Championship, which got him into contention and two shots off the pace after 54 holes. Final day 71 left him in solo third and one shot out of a playoff at Victoria National GC. Solid ball-striking week in Indiana helped him lead the field in Driving Accuracy. Was also T10 in Greens in Regulation...In his next start, at the Utah Championship outside Salt Lake City, he had four under-par rounds, including a Sunday 66, to T9...Would not crack the top-10 the rest of the year and added only one top-25, a T19 at the Price Cutter Charity Championship. 2011: Missed the cut at The Rex Hospital Open. Has played in six events on the PGA TOUR, five coming at the RBC Canadian Open.
tourBios.otherCarHigh: Two-time All-America at the University of Georgia. Member of the Dawgs' 2005 NCAA Championship team...Won the Canadian Amateur in 2003, 2005 and 2006...Former top-ranked amateur in Canada and was low amateur at the 2006 Canadian Open...Member of the Canadian World Amateur Team in 2004, 2005 and 2006...Individual and team champion at Kingsville District High School in Kingsville, Ontario, Canada.
tourBios.personal: Biggest thrill in golf was being part of Georgia's 2005 NCAA Championship team. Was roomates in college with fellow Web.com Tour player Kevin Kisner...Favorite teams are the Georgia Bulldogs, Detroit Tigers and Detroit Lions...Favorite TV show is "NCIS," and his favorite movie is "Pulp Fiction."...Favorite website is thechive.com...Likes to visit New York...Twitter account is @RScottgolf...Carries Power Bars and trail mix in his bag for snacks...Not many people know he worked in a restaurant kitchen in high school...Favorite motto is "Failure is not fatal, but failure to change might be."...Supports the Humane Society and American Cancer Society.

tourBios.curYearHigh: Turned in his first top-10 of the year when he T9 at the News Sentinel Open. Shot four sub-par rounds at Fox Den CC, highlighted by a 67-66 opening that gave him a share of the 36-hole lead.

dyn.dynResults: His best finish on the Web.com Tour was 3rd in 2012 at the United Leasing Championship at Victoria National Golf Club.
